H0.text: Mars is the fourth planet from the Sun in our solar system.

H1.text: Earth is the fourth planet from the Sun in our solar system.

H2.text: Venus is the fourth planet from the Sun in our solar system.

H3.text: Jupiter is the planet that is fourth from the Sun in our solar system.

A4.text: Earth is the third planet from the Sun.

A5.text: Earth orbits the Sun, making Earth the third-closest planet to the Sun and part of the inner Solar System.

A6.text: Closest to the Sun in order of increasing distance are the four terrestrial planets â€“ Mercury, Venus, Earth and Mars.
